name: csbief
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, universe)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2))
-| wnfc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, universe)
-| wnfc(s0, c2)

|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c2)

comment: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class. (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
